Posts.Content: This Discussion/Journal/"Movement" is a true and great idea ... The disconnect between major medical conditions, in the context of the socio-economics in this country, and We, the Patient, and what we obviously need, like here, community, compassion, communication ... and more. That was the Big Oh Wow after I had an ICD installed without which the docs said I'd be dead in no longer than 3 years. Rehab and emotional re-shaping of ones life: NONE/ZERO ... terrific medical team BUT procedure successful so "game over" ... But wait. I'm not dead. That was the point. It doesn't help to feel isolated and abandoned. I'm in the SCA group, and the postings run into I'm guessing at least the HUNDREDS sharing the void of personal and integrated care to reasonable wellness. Bravo! My hopes and spirit are with you! I'll try to help too as that emerges with greater clarity to you. Harvey E Harrison www.harvey-e-harrison.com mercifully brief one page bio. Safe journeys ...
Posts.Title: A new collaboration, "Patient Perspectives," to amplify patients' voices
